en.title: Java Developer
en.description: Responsible for designing and developing enterprise-level Java applications. Participate in system architecture design and optimization, write high-quality, maintainable code. Collaborate closely with product and testing teams to ensure timely delivery and meet business requirements. Engage in code reviews and performance tuning to improve system stability and scalability.

zh.title: Java 开发工程师
zh.description: 负责企业级 Java 应用的设计与开发，参与系统架构设计与优化，编写高质量、可维护的代码。与产品团队和测试团队紧密合作，确保项目按时交付并满足业务需求。参与代码评审和性能调优，提高系统稳定性和扩展性。
zh.institution: 沃尔玛（中国）投资有限公司
